it. On the face of it, this move seems to involve irrelevance, for the character or
social position or status of a person should have nothing to do with the truth
of what that person says or with the soundness or strength of that person’s
arguments. Even when protesters dress shabbily or fail to bathe, their clothing
and hygiene show nothing about the legitimacy of their protest. A speaker’s
ethnicity, race, sex, or sexual orientation almost never give us any good
